title: Oracle Fusion WMS Cloud (Logfire) Self-Paced Training

hero.title: Master Oracle Fusion WMS Cloud (Logfire) Self-Paced Training at Tech Leads IT
hero.shortDescription: Accelerate your career in Warehouse Management with our comprehensive Oracle Fusion WMS Cloud (LogFire) Training! Master core warehousing concepts, gain hands-on experience, and position yourself for success in the logistics and supply chain industry with expert-led training on Oracle WMS Cloud modules.

sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Abhiram, a seasoned Oracle professional with over 14 years of hands-on experience in Warehouse Management Systems, has played a key role in guiding organizations through seamless WMS Cloud implementations across various industries. His passion for teaching and deep expertise in Oracle WMS Cloud (LogFire) make him the perfect mentor for aspiring WMS professionals.With a mission to produce skilled Oracle WMS Cloud consultants to meet the rising industry demand, Abhiram is committed to sharing practical knowledge and empowering learners to build strong careers in supply chain logistics and warehouse automation.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion Cloud WMS (LogFire) Training?
faqs.answer: Our training includes a comprehensive curriculum covering Warehouse Configuration, Inbound Logistics, Outbound Logistics, Inventory Management, & Reporting. Please refer to our course syllabus for the detailed module breakdown.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are held Monday to Friday, with each session lasting 1 hour per day to ensure a consistent and interactive learning experience

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: No, we currently offer live sessions only from Monday to Friday to maintain steady progress and engagement.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for those who prefer to learn at their own pace. Please note that doubt clarification is not included in self-paced learning

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internships are offered based on your performance in mock evaluations, helping you gain hands-on exposure to Oracle Cloud WMS environments

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single WMS Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, Oracle Fusion Cloud WMS training is offered as a complete course, and modules cannot be taken individually.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our team assists you in building a professional resume tailored for Oracle WMS roles, highlighting your skills and practical experience.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a Laptop or Desktop is required to access the Oracle Cloud instance and perform hands-on exercises effectively.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites or Minimum Qualifications Required?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is needed! The course starts from the basics and is open to all graduates (Degree, PG, B.Tech, etc.). Having knowledge of warehouse operations or Oracle EBS WMS is an added advantage.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes, the training begins with foundational concepts and progresses to advanced topics, making it suitable for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete job support through mock interviews, resume building, and career guidance. Our placement network includes companies like Hitachi Vantara, Evosys, Tech Mahindra, LTI, NTT Data, and others.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Support for Oracle Certification?
faqs.answer: Yes, we help you navigate the Oracle WMS Cloud certification process and provide expert tips and practice materials to assist your preparation.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive daily session recordings and module-wise study materials, including screenshots and navigation instructions.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer up-to-date, module-wise interview questions and conduct mock interview sessions to boost your confidence.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance or Application Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 4 months of Oracle WMS Cloud instance access is included for hands-on practice via a URL—no installation required.

faqs.question: Can I Retake This Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once enrolled, you receive a 1-year membership, allowing you to attend multiple batches of the WMS Cloud Training.

faqs.question: Can I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will be awarded a Course Completion Certificate upon successful training completion.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, this course is entirely functional—no coding or programming background is necessary.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, personalized one-on-one training is available on request. Pricing for this is higher than group sessions.
